original_title: 32 accused over Amarakirthi Athukorala’s murder released on bail
original_body_lines: Another 32 accused who were indicted with the murder of former Polonnnaruwa District Parliamentarian Amarakirthi Athukorala and his security officer were released on bail by the three-member-bench of the Gampaha High Court.
They were released on cash bail of Rs.100,000 and four sureties of Rs. 400,000 each by the magistrate.
The case was taken up today before the Bench comprising High Court Judges Sahan Mapa Bandara (President), Rashimi Singappuli and D.A. Ruwan Pathirana.
All the 37 accused including the five who had been released on bail earlier appeared before court today.(Tony Karunanayake)
